metadata.title: CVE-2021-38199 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: fs/nfs/nfs4client.c in the Linux kernel before 5.13.4 has incorrectconnection-setup ordering, which allows operators of remote NFSv4 serversto cause a denial of service (hanging of mounts) by arranging for thoseservers to be unreachable during trunking detection.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
